mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_crawling (crawlingseq, title, site, kind, membername, link, viewscnt, regdate, sort, likecnt, replycnt) VALUES (m_crawling_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{site}, #{kind}, #{membername}, #{link}, #{viewscnt}, #{regdate}, #{sort}, #{likecnt}, #{replycnt})
